noun.description: A spiny tree or shrub of the pea family, native to arid regions of southwestern US and Mexico. It yields useful timber, tanbark, medicinal products, and edible pods. The timber is used for fencing and flooring, and burned in barbecues as flavoring.

proper noun.description: A city in northeastern Texas, east of Dallas; population 132,123 (est. 2008).

origin: Mid 18th century: from Mexican Spanish mezquite.
